test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X green) (sort Y television))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red) (sort Y workspace))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X green) (sort Y couch))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X black) (sort Y worktable))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X can))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red) (sort Y workspace)))) )
test.nl: There is a bottle which is green on the television. There is a can which is red on the workspace. Put a bottle which is green on the couch. Put the black book on the worktable. Put a remotecontrol which is black in the refrigerator. Pick up a can. Go to the closet. The red can must be on the workspace.
